title: Hugelkultur Garden Beds (What, How & Why)
itunes:title: Hugelkultur Garden Beds (What, How & Why)
description: If you've never heard the term hugelkultur gardening you're in for a treat. This centuries-old method of gardening is making a comeback, and this podcast episode is filled with everything you need to know to successfully grow a garden using this German peasant traditional way of gardening. Learn its origins, the proper method, plus tips and tricks for success. For more information, links and shownotes visit melissaknorris.com/323.
